name: JM Cuaresma
text: Verse 1 I’m your home now, you can lay it down All the nights you had to stand your ground Every war you fought in silence Every tear you hid in the dark It’s okay now, I’m right here You’re safe, mahal, just breathe You don’t have to shout to be heard I’m listening to every word Pre-Chorus Close your eyes, let the night pass slow Nothing’s chasing you anymore Chorus This is the love that you deserve This is me, staying true You can rest here in my arms Let the world be quiet for you I’ll be the place you come home to When you’re tired and unsure Please rest now, I love you You don’t have to fight no more Verse 2 Sleep easy now, sleep sound I’ll be here when fear comes around That monster you’ve been facing for a year It can’t reach you when I’m near I know the pain still finds its way Some wounds don’t fade, they stay But I’ll sit with you through the ache I won’t leave when you start to break Pre-Chorus If the past comes knocking late I’ll be here, I’ll make you stay Chorus This is the love that you deserve No conditions, no disguise Lay your head upon my chest Let yourself finally cry I’ll be your calm, your safe haven When the nights feel unsure Please rest now, I love you You are safe, you are sure Bridge (soft, confessional) The trauma stays, I know it’s true But it doesn’t scare me away from you Kapag bumalik ang sakit at takot Hahawakan kita, hindi bibitaw Hindi kita iiwan Mamahalin kita Sa lahat ng pinagdadaanan Final Chorus (gentle lift) This is the love that you deserve This is me, choosing you Every scar, every fear I’ll walk through them all with you I promise I’ll be your safe haven Sa bawat gabi, sa bawat oras Please rest now, I love you Nandito lang ako, palagi
